docs.lead_paragraph: The winner of English rugby's second-tier league will from next season gain automatic promotion to the Premiership, authorities said on Friday, in a move designed to give that team more time to prepare for life among the elite.

headline.main: English Rugby Championship to Scrap Play-Off System From Next Season
headline.print_headline: English Rugby Championship to Scrap Play-Off System From Next Season

docs.snippet: The winner of English rugby's second-tier league will from next season gain automatic promotion to the Premiership, authorities said on Friday, in a move designed to give that team more time to prepare for life among the elite....

docs.lead_paragraph: The company provided incorrect data to some clients, leading them to underpay or overpay their taxes. It’s taking care of the matter with the I.R.S.

docs.snippet: The company provided incorrect data to some clients, leading them to underpay or overpay their taxes. It’s taking care of the matter with the I.R.S....

docs.lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Andy Murray reached his second final of the season with a dominant 7-5, 6-1 win over seventh-seeded Lucas Pouille at the Dubai Tennis Championships on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court Friday refused to revive a Louisiana levee board's lawsuit blaming dozens of oil and gas companies for damage to the state's fragile coast, a major victory for energy companies and their political supporters who cast the suit as an attack on a vital state industry.

docs.lead_paragraph: David Harding, founder of one of the world's biggest hedge funds, on Friday defended his firm against Warren Buffett's criticism of hedge fund fees last week.

docs.lead_paragraph: A former Arkansas state senator and a college president have been charged in a kickback scheme in which thousands of dollars in bribes were paid to lawmakers who directed state funds to two non-profit groups, the U.S. Justice Department said on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's Queen Elizabeth handed out leeks on Friday to Welsh soldiers at Lucknow Barracks in the southwest English county of Wiltshire to mark St David's Day, which fell on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Polish member of the European Parliament has launched another sexist tirade, calling it a "20th century stereotype that women have the same intellectual potential as men," and that the stereotype "must be destroyed because it is not true."

docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a Pennsylvania man who doesn't know how to swim jumped into the deep end of a pool at a New Jersey hotel and rescued a boy from drowning.
